content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Food:  the Shiso (amass riverine, ginger, lime) alcohol free drink was light and refreshing; the Little Gem Salad (anchovy, miso, smoked trout roe) was perfectly balanced and not overpowering with the anchovy, miso or roe flavor; the piece de resistance was the Smoked Bo Ssam (pork shoulder, ssam, condiments) - this was meant for a party of 4 or more for this dish aloneService:  great, timely & friendly serviceDesign:  interiors is a nice modern industrial warehouse with the warm wood touches from the built-ins and tables with the black accents from the chairs and back bar built-in shelvesOverall:  superb, creative flavors that seem familiar, but also paired/combined uniquely; so David Chang is not just hype; this food was worth driving all the way out to this remote spot in DTLA
